verbose_text: Indeed, leptin increases the production of TNF and IL-6 by monocytes and stimulates the production of CC-chemokine ligands (namely, CCL3, CCL4, and CCL5) by macrophages by activating the JAK2 (Janus kinase 2)--STAT3 (signal transducer and activator of transcription 3) pathway [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
